entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: Invalid handling of `nosinglewarnassembly` #93819
  • Disposal of System.Threading.RateLimiting.ConcurrencyLease #93808

Closed

  • GC slows down use of multiple instances of LinkedList and SortedSet in parallel environment #93745
  • AVX512: Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlogq #84534
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: InlineArrayAttribute #61135
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Interlocked intrinsic improvements #93821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add RequiresProcessIsolation to R2RDumpTests #93820
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Optimize "X == Y" to "(X ^ Y) == 0 for SIMD #93818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose BitConverter APIs for Int128 and UInt128 #93817
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: stop creating gc poll blocks in morph #93816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve performance of UnmanagedMemoryStream #93812
    area-System.IO
  • Switch remaining tests using StandaloneApp project to use pre-built asset #93810
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Abstract out LocalBuilder, emit Locals with new ILGenerator #93809
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • JIT: Fix GenTreeCall::Equals virtual kind comparison #93813
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize JsonContent fast path #93759
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] NaN-box float arguments #93665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add common parent for frozen objects #93773
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Stable branding for .NET 8 GA #93807
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • SDK ENOSPC: no space left on device, write #36323
  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Consider adding a --help option to 'dotnet complete' #8902
    Backlog
  • Unable to use package assets cache due to I/O error on build #23600
    Discussion
  • Can not install dotnet-ef through CLI (Unauthorized) #11837
  • .net6.0 app publish in anyCPU does not run on windows 32bits #26647

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix emsdk dep for stable version #36340
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert skipped tests due to VS 17.8-p3 #36337
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest-8.0.100 as a dependency #35569
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Debugging issue with identically named files #70393

Updated

  • "pascal_case" capatilization style only enforces "first_word_upper" #23706
    Backlog
  • Add `dotnet_compiler_diagnostic` element to complement `dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic` #63107
    Backlog
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #67442
    17.6
  • `MetadataDecoder.GetCustomAttribute` referenced only from `PENamedTypeSymbol.DecodeAttributeUsageInfo` should be removed #70338
    17.9
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
    Backlog
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
    17.6 P3
  • C# out param is not reported as an error in visual studio if a local function is called. #69775
    17.9
  • invokenavigatetoforgeneratedfile_infolder failures #69686
  • LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync is flaky #69465
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Trigger build #70508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Classify suffixes of numerical literals as keywords #70507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Pascal and camel case should not allow underscores -- unless "_" is set as word_separator #70506
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Utilize ConstantValueOne while emitting conditionals #70352
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Report all errors and rude edits to the log #70503
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • An unhandled exception occurred while processing the request. AmbiguousMatchException: The request matched multiple endpoints. Matches: FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) #51542
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51540
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #51539
  • ClaimsPrincipal on ASP.NET Core v8.0.100-rc.2.23502.2 Doesn't Contain All Claims From The OpenIdConnect Token #51538

Closed

  • Blazor Server in .NET 8 preview 7 not working when published for Linux #51493
  • Enable using the Blazor WebAssembly loading progress indicator in a Blazor Web App #51510
    Backlog
  • DotNetDispatcher.cs(391,67): error IL2111: Method 'ScanTypeForCallableMethods(Type)' with parameters or return value with `DynamicallyAccessedMembersAttribute` is accessed via reflection #51517

PullRequests

Updated

  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Update Roslyn Versions for .NET 8 #51527
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlyoutPage inside a NavigationPage causes different behavior between Android and iOS #18228
  • CollectionView with Header Causes ArgumentOutOfRangeException on reordering to last index #18227
  • iOS remote build fails when artifact folder is changed #18226
  • Accessing string resource throws a false FileNotFoundException in Android #18225
  • CarouselView layout bugs in iOS #18223
  • MainThread.InvokeOnMainThreadAsync() when called from non-UI thread says "Unable to find main thread" in Windows #18221
  • When loading json into the editor control the double quotes get replaces with invalid quotes #18220

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr9] Bump iOS to correct 16.4.7121 #18222
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #18217
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] [WinUI] Fixes window blinking when resizing #18216
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Disable the new iOS code for now #18206
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18122
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Explicit default in DB is not preserved in EF with HasDefaultValue #32123
  • Generate SQL scripts to create the entire DB (not only tables) #32122
  • Carbonates karrot in design que; possibly not query"absentia #32121
  • EF Core 7 DbContext.Database.BeginTransaction().GetDbTransaction() -> Not able to create new Transaction in same connection #32120
  • dotnet ef cannot find sdk on Ubuntu 23.04 #32119
  • Custom query translation #32117
  • Change ArrayPropertyValues to be backed by an ISnapshot #32116
